content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining System at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter (41.5, -79.5)

### Iron Production Line at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (iron ore) (-28.0, -61.0)
- Storage chest (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter (-23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest (-22.5, -58.5)

### Copper Production Line at position(-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (-18.0, -53.0)
- Storage chest (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter (-13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest (-12.5, -50.5)

### Power Generation System at position(-4.5, 16.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler (-4.5, 16.0)
- Steam engine (-4.5, 12.5)
- Offshore pump (-3.5, 27.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting water and steam

### Automation Science Pack Production at position(8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (8.5, 13.5)
- Input chest (5.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (11.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserters (6.5, 13.5 and 10.5, 13.5)
- Multiple belt groups for item transport
- Additional storage chest (6.5, 14.5)

### Research Lab System
Consists of:
- Lab with electrical connection (id=10070)
- Connected to the power grid through electricity poles

ERROR TIPS

### Issues with Resource Extraction
- Ensure storage chests contain the required items before attempting extraction
- Verify the correct chest location when trying to extract items

### Fuel Management Issues
- Check coal availability in inventory before attempting to insert fuel into machines
- Maintain adequate coal supplies for all burner-type machines (mining drills, inserters, furnaces)

### Production Line Issues
- Monitor and maintain fuel levels in all production machines
- Ensure proper connection and functionality of inserters between machines
- Keep production lines supplied with necessary raw materials

### Power System Management
- Maintain consistent coal supply to boilers
- Monitor steam engine status and water supply
- Ensure proper pipe connections for fluid transport

### Assembly Line Issues
- Verify all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Maintain proper input/output chest connections
- Keep adequate fuel in inserters handling assembly machine inputs/outputs
